attributes.action: Recognise the dual achievements of Neil Harris in football and in raising money for cancer research and care
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
NEIL Harris is now Millwall Football Club's top scorer with 113 goals, scored since he signed in 1998.

But he has also helped raise almost £70,000 for the Everyman Cancer Appeal, which funds research into male cancers and also care for sufferers.

We call upon the Prime Minister to recognise both his contribution to the understanding and awareness of male cancers and their treatment; and the eight years' service he has given to Millwall over two spells, in an era when loyalty to one club is almost unheard-of.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
